DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to assess the acute effect of co-ingested vinegar on postprandial plasma glucose levels in type 2 diabetes patients.
DOC.detailed_description: Plasma glucose and insulin concentrations are assessed over the 2 hr period following ingestion of carbohydrate-rich beverage with or without added vinegar.
DOC.criteria: male type 2 diabetes overweight or obese 4070 yrs incident cardiovascular events during last year peptic ulcer, duodenal ulcer, oesophageal reflux antacids, H2 receptor blocker, proton pump inhibitors, NSAIDS, prokinetic agents
